addRemoteListener

void addRemoteListener(RemoteListener listener)
Used to add a remoteListener to a remote Object.

Parameters:
listener - Instance of the class that implements this listener.

call

void call(java.lang.String methodName,
          java.lang.Object[] params)
Method to make a call to a remote object.

Parameters:
methodName - Remote method name
params - the parameters for the remoting method have the following scenarios
  • No parameter - array of type java.lang.Object should be empty
  • Single parameter - parameter can be passed directly or should be passed as an element from the Object array
  • Multiple parameters - pass multiple parameters as elements of java.lang.Object array
